        public GamePlay loadGame()
        Returns:
        the Gameplay which was read from a file

      • read

        public void read()
        Reads saved GamePlay's data from a file, and constructs a new gameplay.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file, with this label, will be read.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException, - IOException, SAXException; if the file is missing, corrupted, or not in proper format.
        Requires:
        File with the given name should be existed and should be in proper XML format.
